answers.answer: Sometimes gestational diabetes can cause big babies and to.measure bigger.. Have your sugars been OK?

Have they scanned you? Maybe more fluid around the baby. With my second I was 38wks but measured 42wks they scanned me as I had high bp and they wanted to check babies growth. Good job they did because they found this x
Yes my sugar has been good I passed my glucose test
I have a ultrasound next week to see if everything            is ok
I'd make them give you a ultrasound demand it! For all you know there could be two!! It happens!!!  Good luck momma hope everything works out ok?!!!
Thank you I hope so too I'm just feeling a little nervous that's all and two babies I hope not
Lol I'm sure it will be fine they just might monitor you more.often to be safe.
They already monitor me due to me having a stillborn in 2007
Its good to be monitored closely. Im sure your scan will reassure you. Keep positive xx
Aww your welcome. Keep us updated xx

question: What does it mean when you mesure bigger than what your suppose to I'm 29 weeks and doctor said that I'm measuring at 34 I'm confused cause I never had this problem before
title: need help on this!!!
